com.cubeia.firebase.api.service.transaction
Interface SystemTransactionProvider

All Superinterfaces:
Contract
public interface SystemTransactionProvider
extends Contract

This is the public interface for the Firebase transaction system. Using this interface modules can reference the transaction manager and the user transaction.

Author:
Larsan

Method Summary
 EventTransactionContext getEventContext()
          This method returns a context for the currently executing event.
 TransactionManager getTransactionManager()
           
 UserTransaction getUserTransaction()
           
 

Method Detail

getTransactionManager

TransactionManager getTransactionManager()
Returns:
The system transaction manager, never null

getUserTransaction

UserTransaction getUserTransaction()
Returns:
The system user transaction object, never null

getEventContext

EventTransactionContext getEventContext()
This method returns a context for the currently executing event. Ie. if this method is called on by a thread which is executing an event for a game, tournament or a service, the returned context is legal for the given thread and the given execution.

Please note that for external integrations that have started a user transaction manually, this method will still return null.

Returns:
The current event context, or null if called outside an event scope
